---
category: news
title: "Sony Has Patented An AI That Will Play Your Games For You"
excerpt: "Further proving that absolutely nobody learned anything from the Terminator movies, Sony has patented an AI that can study someone’s playstyle and take over playing a game for them. The idea is explained in more detail in a recent patent application that describes the application as an “automated artificial intelligence control mode for playing specific tasks during gaming applications."
